Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

Interface RgbPrimaries

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdobeRgbColorSpace, LinearRgb65ColorSpace, sRgbColorSpace
    public interface RgbPrimaries
    This interface specifies methods for retrieving XYZ coordinates of white point and RGB primaries from the implementing color space.
    Version:
    2022/11/15

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float[] fromCIEXYZ​(float[] value)  
      float[] fromRGB​(float[] value)  
      default float[] getPrimary​(int idx)
      Returns the XYZ color coordinates for the primary color with the specified index, measured relative to the white point of this color space (see getWhitePoint()).
      float[] getWhitePoint()
      Returns the XYZ coordinates of the white point associated with this color space (typically D65 or D50).
      float[] toCIEXYZ​(float[] value)  
      float[] toRGB​(float[] value)  

    • Method Detail

      • toCIEXYZ

        float[] toCIEXYZ​(float[] value)

      • fromCIEXYZ

        float[] fromCIEXYZ​(float[] value)

      • toRGB

        float[] toRGB​(float[] value)

      • fromRGB

        float[] fromRGB​(float[] value)

      • getWhitePoint

        float[] getWhitePoint()
        Returns the XYZ coordinates of the white point associated with this color space (typically D65 or D50).
        Returns:
        the white point

      • getPrimary

        default float[] getPrimary​(int idx)
        Returns the XYZ color coordinates for the primary color with the specified index, measured relative to the white point of this color space (see getWhitePoint()).
        Parameters:
        idx - the color index (R = 0, G = 1, B = 2)
        Returns:
        the XYZ coordinate for the primary color
